de.tif.jacob.screen.dialogs
Interface IBrowserDialog

All Superinterfaces:
IDialog
All Known Subinterfaces:
IExcelDialog, IGridTableDialog
public interface IBrowserDialog
extends IDialog

Base interface for all grid oriented data browsing dialog implementations.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String RCS_ID
          The internal revision control system id.
static java.lang.String RCS_REV
          The internal revision control system id in short form.
 
Method Summary

          Returns the data content of the data browsing dialog.

          Sets the data content of the data browsing dialog.

          Sets the data header labels of the data browsing dialog.

getHeader

java.lang.String[] getHeader()
Returns the data header labels of all data columns.

Returns:

getData

java.lang.String[][] getData()
Returns the data content of the data browsing dialog.

Returns:
the data content which is structured as follows: String [numberOfRows][numberOfColumns]

setHeader

void setHeader(java.lang.String[] header)
Sets the data header labels of the data browsing dialog.

Parameters:
header - the data header which has to be structured as follows: String [numberOfColumns]

setData

void setData(java.lang.String[][] data)
Sets the data content of the data browsing dialog.

Parameters:
data - the data content which has to be structured as follows: String [numberOfRows][numberOfColumns]
